properties.Observatio: The total length of canal is 1Km. Although some parts of the canal have been concreted exist remains as a earthen canal.  5 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.
properties.Descriptio:
Paving available rubble to prevent bank erosion and planting trees

Dry rubble packing (with locally found rubble, size over 225mm )
